name: Hey, I'm here
description:
"The shopping plaza is now open. Please be respectful to other shoppers, and have a great day!"

Feeling lonely is natural. The seeking of companionship, the recognition of one's identity or just the odd "Hey" could mean the world to someone. Whether they are the shopper of a plaza with a strange amount of advertisement posters or if they are the presence of a graffiti artist just wanting their work to be recognized and appreciated on existing works, the fight against being alone could be just as simple as placing a sticker on something.

You play as Spirit, a ghost who haunts a shopping plaza and is facing the difficulties of having no interaction with others ( or at least non-scary paranormal interactions). To combat this loneliness, a sticker designing app has been released for them to make use of. 

Design a sticker of your choice and place it anywhere!

Music by Kevin MacLeod

Special thanks to my friends who provided pictures: Dan, William, Kaleb, Sean, Josh, Noah

Special thanks to Iain McManus for help with the painting code!
